location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: The map shows the estuary of the Euphrates and also indicates hydrology and settlements. Some of the estuary is coloured in blue crayon. A short note beneath the title gives further details: 'Reductions from 1/2 inch detail survey by Survey Section: I.E.F.D. Dated, March, 1916. (Meridians & Parallels Approx) SCALE 4 miles = 1 inch.'The maps bears the printing statement: 'Intelligence Branch General Staff I.E.F. "D" 17-5-16. Map Serial No. 124. 3rd S and M. Field Litho.'
